asciidoc.html:
分支被删除，页面动态存在，可获取到 commit，如何恢复分支？

git fetch origin COMMIT_ID:refs/heads/BRANCH_NAME

  • 拉取远程 COMMIT_ID，并使基于该 COMMIT_ID 在本地创建分支 BRANCH_NAME

恢复某个文件的变更

git show COMMIT_ID:file_path > file_path

  • 将 commit_id 上的文件 file_path 恢复到 本地 file_path

revert

revert 后，再次合并不会成功

#!/usr/bin/bash -e

# A -- B -- C -- F -- G        master
#   \    \
#     D -- (M) -- (R) -- E     release

function commit() {
    a=$1
    echo $a > $a.txt
    git add -A
    git commit -m "$a"
}

b1=master
b2=release

commit "A"
sha_a=$(git rev-parse HEAD)
commit "B"
sha_b=$(git rev-parse HEAD)
commit "C"
commit "F"
commit "G"

git checkout -b $b2 $sha_a
commit "D"

git merge $sha_b
git revert HEAD -m 1
commit "E"

git merge $b1
